title: Emma Roberts looks smitten with beau Garrett Hedlund as the pair embark on a morning hike in LA
text:
They've been dating since March 2019 following her split from Evan Peters.

And Emma Roberts and Garrett Hedlund, 35, looked as loved up as ever on Saturday during an early morning walk at Runyon Canyon.

The 28-year-old dressed casually for the hike and had her arms around her beau.

Scroll down for video

Up and at 'em! Emma Roberts was spotted enjoying a early morning hike with her boyfriend, Garrett Hedlund on Saturday at Runyon Canyon in Los Angeles

Emma rocked a white T-shirt that drew attention to her trim and fit physique.

She teamed the look with burgundy colored full-length tights and sneakers.

The actress styled her brunette hair back into a low bun and kept her shades on top of her head.

Fit and feisty: Emma rocked a white T-shirt that drew attention to her trim and fit physique

Emma appeared to be makeup free and carried a cup of coffee along for the morning outing.

Garrett rocked a blue polo shirt and trousers while with Emma.

He added a cap and kept a low profile with his head down while walking with his bottle of water.

She was later spotted out wearing a strappy black dress with white flowers while picking up lunch.

Emma has been quietly dating Garrett following the end of her relationship from former fiance Evan Peters this past March.

The couple were on-off for years before finally ending it for good this year.

Girl about town: She was later spotted out wearing a strappy black dress with white flowers while picking up lunch

Former love: Emma has been quietly dating Garrett following the end of her relationship from former fiance Evan Peters this past March

Touching upon the split, she told Cosmopolitan back in May: 'I never want to talk about relationships I'm in or that are ending or have ended.'

'It's hard enough to be with someone by yourself, let alone with an audience.'

She continued: 'Growing up is hard. Sometimes it makes me sad that I can't have a private moment. Because of Twitter and Instagram, there's a whole other element where everybody can comment on what you're doing and no one knows the real story.'

'That's hard… I think I know what's true, and I know what happened in my own life and so do the people who love me and who I love.'

As far as Emma's career, the actress will be paying homage to classic horror films of the 1970s and 80s in the new season of American Horror Story.
